text: Uss din munafiq mard-o-orat eman walon say kahan gay kay humara intizar to kero kay hum bhi tumharay noor say kuch roshni hasil kerlen jawab diya jayega kay tum apney peechay lot jao our roshni talash kero phir inkay our unkay darmiyan aik deewar haaeel kerdi jayegi jiss main darwaaza bhi hoga uss kay androoni hissay main to rehmathogi our bahir ki taraf azab hoga
